WorkItem.Description:
Is reproduced on adding huge amount of data (25000 vertices, 40000 edges) to graph.
I subscribe on VertexAdded and try adding edge in my OnVertexAdded method.
I get the attached exception.
When debugging I tried to check if graph contains both vertices I'm trying to create an edge on - yes it does.
WorkItem.Summary: KeyNotFoundException on adding edge in BidirectionalGraph on huge data
